attributes.action: protect supermarket workers- with masks, gloves, temperature checks.
attributes.additional_details: Supermarkets are crowded with people but yet we should avoid public places. So protective measure should be taken for its workers and customers with masks, gloves, deposable suits temperature checks before customers enter.
attributes.background: protect supermarket workers- with masks, gloves, deposable suits temperature checks before customers enter shops. to protect them and their loved ones against coronavirus as well as stopping it spreading to others. Wuhan did it so the UK should to!
